00009 #include "AngleDataspace.h"
00010 
00011 /***********************************************************************************************/
00012 // rad is also the neutral format
00013 RadianUnit::RadianUnit()
00014         : DataspaceUnit("radian")
00015 {;}
00016 
00017 
00018 RadianUnit::~RadianUnit()
00019 {;}
00020                 
00021 
00022 void RadianUnit::convertToNeutral(long inputNumArgs, t_atom *inputAtoms, long *outputNumArgs, double *output)
00023 {
00024         *outputNumArgs = 1;
00025         *output = atom_getfloat(inputAtoms);
00026 }
00027 
00028 
00029 void RadianUnit::convertFromNeutral(long inputNumArgs, double *input, long *outputNumArgs, t_atom **outputAtoms)
00030 {
00031         *outputNumArgs = 1;
00032         atom_setfloat(*outputAtoms, *input);
00033 }
00034 
00035 
00036 /***********************************************************************************************/
00037 DegreeUnit::DegreeUnit()
00038         : DataspaceUnit("degree")
00039 {;}
00040 
00041 
00042 DegreeUnit::~DegreeUnit()
00043 {;}
00044                 
00045                 
00046 void DegreeUnit::convertToNeutral(long inputNumArgs, t_atom *inputAtoms, long *outputNumArgs, double *output)
00047 {
00048         *outputNumArgs = 1;
00049         *output = atom_getfloat(inputAtoms) * kDegreesToRadians; //kDegreesToRadians defined in DataspaceLib.h
00050 }
00051 
00052 
00053 void DegreeUnit::convertFromNeutral(long inputNumArgs, double *input, long *outputNumArgs, t_atom **outputAtoms)
00054 {
00055         *outputNumArgs = 1;
00056         atom_setfloat(*outputAtoms, (*input * kRadiansToDegrees));//kRadiansToDegrees defined in DataspaceLib.h
00057 }
00058 
00059 /***********************************************************************************************/
00060 AngleDataspace::AngleDataspace()
00061         : DataspaceLib("angle", "radian") //would "<" be possible ??
00062 {
00063         // Create one of each kind of unit, and cache them in a hash
00064         registerUnit(new RadianUnit,    gensym("radian"));
00065         registerUnit(new RadianUnit,    gensym("rad"));
00066         registerUnit(new DegreeUnit,    gensym("degree"));
00067         registerUnit(new DegreeUnit,    gensym("deg"));
00068         
00069         // Now that the cache is created, we can create a set of default units
00070         setInputUnit(neutralUnit);
00071         setOutputUnit(neutralUnit);
00072 }
00073 
00074 
00075 AngleDataspace::~AngleDataspace()
00076 {
00077         ;
00078 }
